abstract: Iranian authorities permit Washington Post reporter Jason Rezaian, imprisoned in Tehran’s Evin Prison since 2014 on espionage and other charges, Christmas visit with family members.
lead_paragraph: Jason Rezaian, the Washington Post correspondent who has been incarcerated since July 2014, was permitted an extended visit with his wife and mother.

headline.main: Iran: Relatives Visit a Jailed Reporter
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Iran: Relatives Visit a Jailed Reporter

snippet: Jason Rezaian, the Washington Post correspondent who has been incarcerated since July 2014, was permitted an extended visit with his wife and mother.
